invalidEmailFormat: Invalid email format, must include '@' and '.'
passwordLength: Password Have at least (one uppercase letter ,one lowercase letter, one number, one special character from the set @$!%*#?&)
passwordCriteria: Password must contain at least one letter and one number
dateOfBirthFuture: Date of birth cannot be in the future
firstNameSpaceLetter: First name must contain only letters and spaces
LastNameSpaceLetter: last name must contain only letters and spaces
noRepeatCharacters: Password must not contain repeating characters
noCommonWords: Password must not contain common words
